sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FiUser, FiMail, FiPhone, FiCreditCard } from 'react-icons/fi'; import { format } from 'date-fns'; const BookingForm = ({ flight, user, onBook }) => { const [passengerInfo, setPassengerInfo] = useState({ name: user.name, email: user.email, phone: '+91 9876543210' }); const [isBooking, setIsBooking] = useState(false); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsBooking(true); const success = await onBook(flight.flight_id, passengerInfo); if (!success) { setIsBooking(false); } }; const handleChange = (e) => { setPassengerInfo({ ...passengerInfo, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (

Complete Your Booking

Passenger Details

Flight Summary

Flight: {flight.airline} {flight.flight_id}
Route: {flight.departure_city} → {flight.arrival_city}
Departure: {format(new Date(flight.departure_time), 'MMM dd, hh:mm a')}
Duration: {Math.round((new Date(flight.arrival_time) - new Date(flight.departure_time)) / (1000 * 60 * 60))}h
Seats: {flight.available_seats} left
Base Price: ₹{flight.base_price}
{flight.surge_multiplier > 1 && (
Surge (+{((flight.surge_multiplier - 1) * 100).toFixed(0)}%): +₹{flight.current_price - flight.base_price}
)}
Total Amount: 1 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-purple-900'}`}> ₹{flight.current_price}

Your Wallet Balance

₹{user.walletBalance.toLocaleString()}

{user.walletBalance >= flight.current_price ? ( '✅ Sufficient balance for booking' ) : ( '❌ Insufficient balance' )}

); }; export default BookingForm;
